Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a game-changing solution at a competitive rate. I understand that investments of this magnitude require careful consideration, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information about the product's capabilities and benefits.

Should you decide to proceed with the purchase, I assure you that our dedicated customer support team will be available to assist you throughout the implementation process and ensure a smooth transition.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
